alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:16AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, northwestern Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, southeastern Leon and southwestern Madison Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1016 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Woodville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Newport, Cody, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Lamont, Aucilla, Capps, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Plum Orchard, Drifton, Fanlew, Waukeenah and Wacissa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison
